venue.address_2: entrance on corner of Pleasant St and State St
venue.name: The Center for Community, Culture and Change

item.description: What is a ghost? Is it somehow different from a Spirit? And can either manifest itself onto our earthly plane of existence? Join A.J. Kitt, founder and lead investigator of the Seacoast Paranormal Research Group, and Isabeau Esby, internationally known psychic medium, as they discuss the realities of hauntings and what possibilities may lurk in every home, business or graveyard! Cost - $10 per person, pay at the door Speakers - A.J. Kitt (www.SeacoastParanormal.net) and Isabeau Esby (www.IsabeauEsby.com)
item.how_to_find_us: The entrance is located directly on the corner of Pleasant St and State St
item.name: Ghosts and Spirits Lecture
